ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] From a magician list. A little more info
ygData.msgSnippet: I would, but I have no idea how to fit 27 things into my 8 slot toolbox... Cogg - RZ ... From: Xeus Telestubby  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I would, but I have no idea how to fit 27 things into my 8 slot toolbox...

Cogg - RZ

----- Original Message -----
From: Xeus Telestubby <x_revenger@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 15, 2000 5:02 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] From a magician list. A little more info


> HAS anyone tried THIS EXACT RECIPE?(i.e. using the
> mutliple items and using gizmo #6)??
>
>
> Inferno Shock (Wizzie Spell)
> Metal Twine
> Metal Rod
> Gizmo #6
> Large Lantern
> (13 X) Size 6 sprockets
> (5 X) Metal Bits (used in smithing)
> (4 X) Ambers
>
>
> -Xeus Telestubby, Gnomish Wizzie of the 30th power
